item.title: How would you make a staffmeeting command?
item.dc:creator: @cardguydude cardguydude
item.description:
@cardguydude wrote:

[quote=“dun dun dun, post:2, topic:431955”]Try this, made it up quick but I think it should work.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("meeting")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if (c2.playerRights > 0 && c2.playerRights != 3) { c2.getPA().movePlayer(x-coordHere, y-coordHere, heightLevelHere); //You do need to change the coords and height of the teleport. c2.sendMessage(c.playerName + " has called a staff meeting."); } } } }[/quote]
ty

Read full topic
item.source: How would you make a staffmeeting command?

item.title: How would you make a staffmeeting command?
item.dc:creator: @dun_dun_dun dun dun dun
item.description:
@dun_dun_dun wrote:

Try this, made it up quick but I think it should work.

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("meeting")) { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if (c2.playerRights > 0 && c2.playerRights != 3) { c2.getPA().movePlayer(x-coordHere, y-coordHere, heightLevelHere); //You do need to change the coords and height of the teleport. c2.sendMessage(c.playerName + " has called a staff meeting."); } } } }

Read full topic
item.source: How would you make a staffmeeting command?
